chapter.title: Terminology test
chapter.para: Two 32 bit systems equal one 64 bit system.
Two 32-bit systems equal one 64-bit system.
I use Mac OS X at work.
I have several macOS boxes at home.
SUSE Linux is a great OS.
SUSE Linux Enterprise is a great OS.
S4S is the only OS based on SLES that is certified by SAP.
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP is the only OS based on SLES that is certified by SAP.
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications is the only OS based on SLES that is certified by SAP.
SLE for SAP is the only OS based on SLES that is certified by SAP.
SLES for SAP Applications is the only OS based on SLES that is certified by SAP.
Try SUSE Linux Enterprise Storage today.
Try SUSE Enterprise Storage today.
The primary solution for the private-cloud market is SUSE Cloud.
The primary solution for the private-cloud market is SUSE OpenStack Cloud.
The new SUSE Server has been certified by many partners.
The new SUSE Linux Enterprise Server has been certified by many partners.
virt-p2v is now available as a technology preview.
virt-p2v is now available as a technical preview.
From the drop-down box Something, select Something Else.
From the pulldown menu Something, select Something Else.
From the drop-down Something, select Something Else.
From the drop-down-menu Something, select Something Else.
The printer will print out the test page.
To continue, press the Select button.
SUSE Lunix Enterprise is an advanced operating system.
And then came Ubuntu and invented the LiveCD which would go on to revolutionize the way Linux is distributed forever.
Start by filling your name, birth date and address into the GUI mask.
There is a mask for every subnet.
Knowing network masks is often helpful.
Hard-linking can be very convenient.
The link mode mediates access to hard links.
